content: They're a pretty new shop, I don't think they have a big online presence yet. But I'll definitely recommend them to friends. As for why I chose them, I just happened to be walking by and saw their sign. I was in need of a cleaning, so I decided to give them a try. They did a quick job and were really friendly, so I'm happy with my choice. By the way, do you know when the next sale is for Adidas shoes? I'm thinking of getting another pair.
